trans-unit.source: Specifies how client scripts of the [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] client library are included on the client.
trans-unit.target: Specifica come gli script client del [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] libreria client sono inclusi nel client.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that all [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] script features are disabled and that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control does not reference any scripts automatically.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che tutti i [!INCLUDE[ajax_current_ext](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] le caratteristiche di script vengono disabilitate e che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controllo non fa riferimento a tutti gli script automaticamente.

trans-unit.source: Specifies that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"></xref> control automatically includes the MicrosoftAjax.js script file, which is a combined script file of every core framework script (legacy behavior).
trans-unit.target: Specifica che il <xref href="System.Web.UI.ScriptManager"> </xref> controllo include automaticamente il file di script MicrosoftAjax.js, ovvero un file di script combinato di ogni script di framework di base (comportamento legacy).

trans-unit.source: Specifies that you will explicitly include script references to individual framework core script file that your page requires, and that you will include references to the dependencies that each script file requires.
trans-unit.target: Specifica che verranno incluse in modo esplicito riferimenti a script al file di script singoli framework core che richiede la pagina e di includere riferimenti a tutte le dipendenze che richiede di ogni file di script.
